In England, in the seven days to 07 October, there were 201,974 new confirmed cases (357.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 30 September, there were 191,311 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 6% (10,663 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 12 October is 7,000,356 (12,379 cases per 100,000 population).
